description: Veno-venous ECMO. Venous drainage through a venous cannula and return to  venous circulation after gas exchange.
Veno-arterial ECMO. Venous drainage through a venous cannula and return to arterial circulation after gas exchange. Includes LAVA or other LV offloading mechanisms
Veno-arteriovenous ECMO. Venous drainage through a venous cannula and return to both the arterial and venous circulations after gas exchange.
Venoveno-arterial ECMO. Venous drainage through two separate venous cannulae and return to arterial circulation after gas exchange.
Venoveno-venous ECMO. Venous drainage through two separate venous cannulae and return to venous circulation after gas exchange.
Veno-pulmonary ECMO, aka Oxy-RVAD. E.g. ProTek Duo
Other ECMO cannulation strategy not specified in other categories
